stlearn.tl.cci.merge¶

stlearn.tl.cci.merge(adata: anndata._core.anndata.AnnData, use_lr: str = 'lr_neighbours_louvain_max', use_het: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame = None) → anndata._core.anndata.AnnData¶

Merge results from cell type heterogeneity and L-R clustering :param adata: :type adata: AnnData The data object including the cell types to count :param use_lr: :type use_lr: str The largest expressed L-R cluster :param use_het: :type use_het: pd.DataFrame The counts result of cell type heterogneity

Returns

counts

Return type

pd.DataFrame The counts of specified clusters in each window of the tissue
